Header: Verstappen wins Austrian GP, Vettel regains championship lead
Content: Max Verstappen won Red Bull’s home Austrian Grand Prix while Lewis Hamilton suffered his first race retirement since 2016 and lost the Formula One championship lead to Ferrari’s Sebastian Vettel. The victory was the 20-year-old Dutch driver’s first of the season, fourth of his career, and came in front of an army of orange-shirted fans packing the grandstands and then flooding onto the track at the finish.
